issue.title: Default Parquet chunk_size of 64k is too small
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-357](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-357). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current default size of RowGroups when writing Parquet files is 64k rows. This produces a lot of RowGroups given large files which are then really ineffective to read.
